member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Authorization.AuthorizeRouteView
member.summary:
Combines the behaviors of and , so that it displays the page matching the specified route but only if the user is authorized to see it.
Additionally, this component supplies a cascading parameter of type , which makes the user's current authentication state available to descendants.

member.summary: The content that will be displayed while asynchronous authorization is in progress.
